product_name: humangear GoTubb 0.9 cu. in. Container - Package of 3
long_description: The small humangear GoTubb containers feature a smart design that allows you to open and close them with only 1 hand for easy access while you're on the go. To open, just squeeze the sides and the lid releases; to close, simply press the lid back on. Works great for holding pills, knick-knacks, earplugs, change and other small items. 100% BPA free and phthalate free; containers are completely recyclable at the end of their long lives. Package includes 3 humangear GoTubb containers.
